bioAsHtml: Working in the security area since more than 15 years, I'm now working for IBM as advisory architect. During my carrier, I developed security products (an auto-reconfigurable firewall), I worked for securing application and infrastructure (SCADA, avionics ...) , I performed audits and pentest and I build SOC architecture.

acceptedTalks.title: Test de pénétration Web avancé et codage sécurisé

bio:
Working in the security area since more than 15 years, I'm now working for IBM as advisory architect. 
During my carrier, I developed security products (an auto-reconfigurable firewall), I worked for securing application and infrastructure (SCADA, avionics ...) , I performed audits and pentest and I build SOC architecture.
